definition: to miss the target (with a bullet or an arrow)
emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: That politician cries wolf in every speech he makes.
sentences.chinese: 那個政治家在他的每篇演說中都虛發警報。

sentences.english: We've only a few bullets left, so make each one count.
sentences.chinese: 我們只剩幾顆子彈了，因此要彈不虛發。

sentences.english: We've only a few bullets left, so make each one count, ie use it effectively.
sentences.chinese: 我們只剩幾顆子彈了，因此要彈不虛發。
